vibrant.translation[0].definitions[0].de: full of activity or energy in a way that is exciting and attractive
vibrant.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Hong Kong is a vibrant, fascinating city.
She was sixteen, young and vibrant.
vibrant.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a vibrant colour is bright and strong
vibrant.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: a painting full of vibrant reds and blues
